text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow You literally stand with the racist, bigot, fraud, liar, pervert, anti-Semite, credibly accused sex offender and traitor to America @realDonaldTrump. Tens of thousands of Americans are dead due to his negligence with Covid19. Putin put bounties on AMERICAN SOLDIERS HEADS.
